Title: Amends the definitions of pet dealers
Summary: Amends the definitions of pet dealers; decreases the number of animals a person can distribute to fit under the exemption.
LawCode: Amd ยง400, Ag & Mkts L; amd ยง752, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the general business law, in relation to the definition of pet dealer
